title: Matplotlib Visualization Fundamentals
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use Matplotlib, a Python library for creating visualizations, to create a figure and annotate its anatomy. You will learn how to create a figure, plot data, set axis limits, add labels and titles, and annotate the figure with text and markers.

meta.title: Matplotlib Visualization Fundamentals
meta.description: Learn how to use Matplotlib, a powerful Python library, to create stunning visualizations and annotate figures.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, data visualization, figure, plotting
